title: How should I start writing a novel with an introduction or opening with a scene? - Quora

response.answer_text: Once I read in a book, when a younger brother was asking his elder brother how to start the book he wants to write, and the answer by his brother was- Book is sheerly something you put your thoughts, imaginations or real life incidents into. Start with anywhere from any time; it could be like. If you take a pen and paper today and start writing from the morning schedule till now like; ‘ i was standing on a bus stand on Monday and then…..’ just continue after this and connect the past with it later on.

I read once a good starter usually has a name in it. It does not have to be the main char. I try not to start out with the weather, unless that is important to the plot. Just try somethings out and read intros from different authors to get an idea.
